title: Residential Land Blocks for Sale in Kiribathgoda.
details: Highly Residential Land Blocks for Sale in Kiribathgoda Road, Makola. Decent residential area with excellent neighborhood. Just 3 Km from Kiribathgoda City Centre, 100 m from Makola “Y” junction, There are five 10 – 12 Perches Land Blocks or if anyone needs the entire land (65.5 Perches) we can sell you the entire land.
